TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataSourceCacheDurationConverter extends System.ComponentModel.Int32Converter

summary.span: 提供型別轉換子 (Type Converter)，將 32 位元帶正負號的整數物件與其他資料來源控制項快取期間表示相互轉換。

span.span: Provides a type converter to convert 32-bit signed integer objects to and from data source control cache duration representations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 資料來源控制項支援快取通常提供`CacheDuration`屬性，您可以控制快取資料設定為秒數。ASP.NET data source controls that support caching typically provide a `CacheDuration` property that you can set to the number of seconds that the control caches data. 值 0 表示 「 無限 」 中這些快取內容，而類別會負責此明確轉換。The value 0 represents "Infinite" in these caching contexts, and the class takes care of this explicit conversion. 不使用網頁開發人員類別。Page developers do not use the class. 控制項開發人員會開發支援快取的資料來源控制項使用這個型別轉換子，連同屬性裝飾的屬性代表自訂資料來源控制項設定為快取持續時間。Control developers who are developing data source controls that support caching use this type converter along with the attribute to decorate a property that represents a cache duration setting of a custom data source control. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何來裝飾上支援使用快取的資料來源控制項的屬性屬性。The following code example demonstrates how you can decorate a property on a data source control that supports caching with a attribute. 在此範例中，資料來源控制項支援快取的語意，並公開 （expose） 建立模型之後，其他 ASP.NET 資料來源控制項的三個屬性： `EnableCaching`， `CacheDuration`，和`CacheExpirationPolicy`。In this example, the data source control supports caching semantics and exposes three properties modeled after other ASP.NET data source controls: `EnableCaching`, `CacheDuration`, and `CacheExpirationPolicy`. `CacheDuration`屬性使用型別轉換子。The `CacheDuration` property uses the type converter. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter/CS/somedatasourcecdc.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.DataSourceCacheDurationConverter/VB/somedatasourcecdc.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法轉換字串或字串"Infinite"的值為 0。The method converts an string or the string "Infinite" to the value 0. 其他值由基底類別，處理。Other values are handled by the base class, .

in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件一律會傳回`true`表示方法應該呼叫以尋找一組常用的值轉換器支援。The object always returns `true` to indicate that the method should be called to find a common set of values the converter supports.
